job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Title: Data Scientist (Machine Learning, AWS, Python) Location: San Francisco CA Contract Duration: 12 Months  Candidates must have experience in Machine Learning (Client), NLP, Computer Vision (CV), transformer, good coding skills.   9+ years exp.  Job Description:  Experience with production-level Deep Learning models in Computer Vision and NLP. Expertise in software development with Python (including Object-Oriented design, Python packaging, and unit testing). Experience with PySpark. Familiarity with distributed model training frameworks like Horovod and Petastorm (although this can be learned). Familiarity with MLOps frameworks like MLflow. Familiarity with SQL. Some familiarity with AWS Lambda, AWS SageMaker, Jenkins, and Databricks. Familiarity with Git.
